note: Castro Investigative Agency is a Premier Investigation Company headquartered in New York City with offices in Queens New York, Miami Florida, and Punta Cana Dominican Republic. Founded in 2004, our 25 years of expertise and investigative experience, combined with our extensive network of dedicated and highly experienced investigators, allows us to operate not only in the United States but also in the Caribbean, South America and Europe.
